title: Molyvos, Greek in Midtown West, Reopens in a New Location
description: Kwame Onwuachiâ€™s restaurant debuts in David Geffen Hall; the Atoboy team unveils its Rockefeller Center spot; and more restaurant news.

media:description: Molyvos, a Greek restaurant with a long history on Seventh Avenue and 55th Street, has moved to a smaller space a dozen blocks south.
